main event: On September 19, 1958, two circular discs, resembling basketballs, were observed shifting from side to side over Montgomery Field in San Diego.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 10 to 20 seconds,The discs were described as silvery metallic in appearance,The observer had experience in aircraft recognition with two years at the Naval Training Center,The sighting was visually confirmed as ground-visual,There was a possibility that the objects could have been balloons.
witness description: an experienced observer in aircraft recognition
